Key Match Events: England won 5-3 on penalties against Switzerland.
Saka scored for England in the 80th minute.
Kane scored for England in the 67th minute.
Embolo scored for Switzerland in the 75th minute.
Schar received a yellow card in the 32nd minute.
Widmer received a yellow card in the 85th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: England could be without Jude Bellingham for their Euro 2024 quarter-final against Switzerland due to a potential one-match ban.
Bellingham has been a key figure for England, scoring two of their four goals in the tournament so far.
Southgate might need to look elsewhere for a replacement if Bellingham is suspended.
